Public Instance Methods

manifest() click to toggle source 
    # File generators/dojo/dojo_generator.rb, line 20
20:   def manifest
21:     m = nil
22:     
23:     # TODO: Figure out the right way to throw errors.  There's probably a more
24:     # "railsy" way to do this.
25:     begin
26:       raise "TYPE and NAME must be passed as arguments" unless type && name
27:       
28:       m = case type
29:       when "build": build_manifest
30:       when "dijit": module_manifest
31:       when "module": module_manifest
32:       end
33:     rescue Exception => e
34:       puts "USAGE ERROR: " + e.to_s + "\n\n"
35:       puts usage()
36:     end
37:     m
38:   end

Private Instance Methods

build_manifest() click to toggle source 
    # File generators/dojo/dojo_generator.rb, line 70
70:   def build_manifest
71:     setup_build_instance_vars
72:     
73:     record do |m|
74:       m.template "build/profile.js", "#{JS_PATH}/#{build_file}"
75:       m.template "build/README", "#{JS_PATH}/README"
76:     end
77:   end
module_manifest() click to toggle source 
     # File generators/dojo/dojo_generator.rb, line 79
 79:   def module_manifest
 80:     setup_instance_vars
 81:     
 82:     raise "Module TYPE must be in the format namespace.module" unless split_name.length > 1
 83:     case type
 84:     when "module":
 85:       source_js = "module/module.js"
 86:       source_test_html = "module/tests/test_module.html"
 87:       source_readme = "module/README"
 88:     when "dijit":
 89:       source_js = "dijit/Dijit.js"
 90:       source_test_html = "dijit/tests/test_Dijit.html"
 91:       source_readme = "dijit/README"
 92:     end
 93:     record do |m|
 94:       m.directory module_rails_dir
 95:       m.template source_js, module_js_rails_path
 96:       if type == "dijit"
 97:         m.directory "#{module_rails_dir}/templates"
 98:         m.template "dijit/templates/Dijit.html", "#{module_rails_dir}/templates/#{module_name}.html"
 99:       end
100:       m.directory "#{module_rails_dir}/tests"
101:       m.template "shared/tests/all.js", "#{module_rails_dir}/tests/all.js"
102:       m.template source_test_html, "#{module_rails_dir}/tests/test_#{module_name}.html"
103:       m.template "shared/tests/runTests.html", "#{module_rails_dir}/tests/runTests.html"
104:       m.template source_readme, "#{module_rails_dir}/README"
105:     end
106:   end
setup_build_instance_vars() click to toggle source 
    # File generators/dojo/dojo_generator.rb, line 54
54:   def setup_build_instance_vars
55:     @build_file = "#{name}.profile.js"
56:     setup_generated_prefixes
57:   end
setup_generated_prefixes() click to toggle source 
    # File generators/dojo/dojo_generator.rb, line 59
59:   def setup_generated_prefixes
60:     js_dirs = Dir["#{RAILS_ROOT}/public/javascripts/*"].select { |f| File.directory?(f) }
61:     modules = js_dirs.select { |d| dirname = d.split("/").pop; dirname != "dojo" && dirname != "." && dirname != ".." }
62:     if modules
63:       @generated_prefixes = modules.collect { |dir|
64:         dirname = dir.split("/").pop
65:         "[ '#{dirname}', '../../#{dirname}' ]"
66:       }
67:     end
68:   end
setup_instance_vars() click to toggle source 
    # File generators/dojo/dojo_generator.rb, line 43
43:   def setup_instance_vars
44:     tmp_module_array = name.split(".")
45:     @split_name = Array.new(tmp_module_array)
46:         @module_name = tmp_module_array.pop
47:         @module_namespace = tmp_module_array.first
48:         @module_prefix = tmp_module_array.join(".")
49:         @module_public_dir = tmp_module_array.split('.').join('/')
50:         @module_rails_dir = "#{JS_PATH}/#{module_public_dir}"
51:         @module_js_rails_path = "#{module_rails_dir}/#{module_name}.js"
52:   end
